head.title: PCLS COVID-19 Closure – PCLS COVID-19 Closure – Painesville City Local Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Painesville City Local serves K-12th grade students and is located in Painesville, OH.

nav.a: Personal Device WiFi Access Request Form

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Updated April 27, 2020

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Governor DeWine has extended the state-wide school closure through the remainder of the school year. Below are updates regarding the operations of Painesville City Schools during this extended closure period.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Again, this is a situation that is continually evolving. Updates will be provided by the district as they become necessary.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: First, effective communication is critical for the distance-learning program to be successful. Beginning next week, teachers will be making many contacts home. Teachers will be holding virtual “office hours” when they are available for questions and additional assistance. These hours should be posted within each teacher’s

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Please check these hours for each of your child’s teachers, and be certain that you/your child takes advantage of them as necessary.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Teachers will also be sending emails and placing phone calls to follow-up and check-in when necessary. This would be a good time to check your information in

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to be certain that your phone number and email address are up to date. If you need assistance with updating your information, send a message to

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . When a teacher calls, please know that the caller ID displayed will likely be “No Caller ID”. If these calls go to voicemail, please be certain to return them. The teacher will leave an email and/or a number at which they can be reached. When you return a call to the number provided, please know that the call will go to voicemail, as the call is being routed through the teacher’s classroom phone.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Students can access their online

p.span: Families who need a computer and have not yet borrowed one from the district can place a computer request through this form:

p.style: line-height: 1.656; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you put in a request through this form, you will be contacted with instructions for pick-up.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Families requiring assistance with logging in and accessing activities through the online platform can place a request through this form:

p.style: line-height: 1.656; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you are using a district Chromebook, and if it becomes broken or if it malfunctions, the district will have Chromebook “repair” hours each Wednesday from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. Should you need this service, please follow these guidelines:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Please be certain to make your request through this form:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: After you place your request, you will receive a confirmation email

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Come to the main entrance (by flag pole) of Heritage Middle School during “repair” hours

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Please ring the doorbell attached to the door, and a member of the technology department will meet you at the door.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Please bring the device, with any broken pieces, and BOTH parts of the charging cord

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Painesville City Schools is

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: providing WiFi access to students via school vans equipped with mobile access points

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Multiple vans will be positioned throughout the city,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: , on a regular schedule.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: These mobile access points have a range of 500 feet, and can support about 100 devices at a time. Students who do not have reliable internet access at home can access this service, download their work from their online classrooms, complete that work off-line (if necessary), then upload completed work to their online classroom when the vans return. Students who cannot access the signal from home may move closer to the van to position themselves in range of the signal, as long as it is done safely and social distancing guidelines are observed. The white school vans are clearly marked.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please note that this service is intended to support student learning. We ask that the service is not accessed for any other purposes, as capacity is limited. Streaming sites such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc. will be blocked.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The following is the schedule of times and locations for each stop:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Seneca Grove Apartments (formerly Argonne Arms)

Thanks to generous donations from Avery Dennison, Lifeline, Grand Rock Exhaust Solutions, and Catalyst Ministry for making this service possible.

p.span: Please contact Kelly Minnick with any questions: minnick@pcls.net

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: Will we need to make up these days?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The state has enacted legislation which “permits schools to make up through distance learning any number of days or hours necessary to meet minimum instructional hour requirements”. This means that these days used to deliver online learning will be counted as instructional days for the 2019-20 school year, and there will not be a requirement that the school year be extended.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: What about state testing and graduation requirements?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Also included in the recent legislation are provisions related to state testing and graduation requirements. There will be no state testing this year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As for graduation requirements, the legislation “permits schools to grant high school diplomas to students on track to graduate and for whom the principal determines that the student has successfully completed the curriculum”. Based on this directive, and on the fact that students do not have access to the activities necessary to complete alternative pathways or to retake state exams,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: the district has elected to award diplomas to any senior who completes the 21 credits necessary to graduate. The additional requirements typically in place (state tests, “capstone” project, WorkKeys test, volunteer hours, etc.) are waived

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . This applies to this school year only, and is in effect as long as the Ohio Department of Education does not issue conflicting directives.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: What about sports and other activities?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Consistent with directives from the state, and in the interest of the health and safety of everyone, all district activities will continue to remain suspended during the period of school closure.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: How can students retrieve their belongings from the schools?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Retrieval of personal belongings will be done according to directives from the Lake County General Health District. We are currently awaiting their guidance. Once we receive this guidance, procedures and a schedule will be shared.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: While we had tentatively established alternate dates for prom and Commencement (July 10 and July 19, respectively), the Ohio Department of Education has issued a statement which impacts such events:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: “While we understand the significance, tradition and rites of passage many of these events represent, particularly for our seniors, schools should hold events virtually rather than conducting in-person events of this type, and record these events whenever possible and practicable. Congregate graduation ceremonies should not be held.”

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: State guidance is that any recognition ceremonies are to be held in accordance with the Ohio Department of Health’s orders, and that they are to be held virtually rather than in-person. At this time, we do not know exactly what this looks like. It is, however, extremely important that we give our graduates the recognition they deserve, so we will be doing our very best to provide this recognition in accordance with the state’s health and safety directives. Unfortunately, we do not see a way of providing an alternative to prom at this time. More information will be shared as there are further developments on these questions.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Actualizado el 27 de abril de 2020

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: El gobernador DeWine ha extendido el cierre de la escuela en todo el estado durante el resto del año escolar. A continuación se presentan actualizaciones sobre las operaciones de las Escuelas de la Ciudad de Painesville durante este período de cierre extendido.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Nuevamente, esta es una situación que evoluciona continuamente. El distrito proporcionará actualizaciones cuando sean necesarias.

strong.span: para apoyar el trabajo escolar de su hijo

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Primero, la comunicación efectiva es fundamental para que el programa de aprendizaje a distancia sea exitoso. A partir de la próxima semana, los maestros harán muchos contactos en casa. Los maestros tendrán "horas de oficina" virtuales cuando estén disponibles para preguntas y asistencia adicional. Estas horas deben publicarse en cada

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: maestro. Verifique estas horas para cada uno de los maestros de su hijo y asegúrese de que usted / su hijo se aproveche de ellos según sea necesario.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Los maestros también enviarán correos electrónicos y realizarán llamadas telefónicas para el seguimiento y el registro cuando sea necesario. Este sería un buen momento para verificar su información en

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: para asegurarse de que su número de teléfono y dirección de correo electrónico estén actualizados. Si necesita ayuda para actualizar su información, envíe un mensaje a

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Cuando un maestro llama, tenga en cuenta que la identificación de la persona que llama que se muestra probablemente sea "Sin identificación de la persona que llama". Si estas llamadas van al correo de voz, asegúrese de devolverlas. El maestro dejará un correo electrónico y / o un número en el que puedan ser contactados. Cuando devuelva una llamada al número proporcionado, sepa que la llamada irá al correo de voz, ya que la llamada se enruta a través del teléfono del aula del maestro.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Se colocarán varias camionetas en toda la ciudad, de

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Estos puntos de acceso móvil tienen un alcance de 500 pies y pueden admitir alrededor de 100 dispositivos a la vez. Los estudiantes que no tienen acceso a Internet en casa pueden acceder a este servicio, descargar su trabajo de sus aulas en línea, completar ese trabajo fuera de línea (si es necesario), y luego cargar el trabajo completado en su aula en línea cuando regresen las camionetas. Los estudiantes que no pueden acceder a la señal desde casa pueden acercarse a la camioneta para posicionarse dentro del alcance de la señal, siempre que se haga de manera segura y se observen las pautas de distanciamiento social. Las camionetas blancas de la escuela están claramente marcadas.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Tenga en cuenta que este servicio está destinado a apoyar el aprendizaje de los estudiantes. Solicitamos que no se acceda al servicio para ningún otro propósito, ya que la capacidad es limitada. Se bloquearán los sitios de transmisión como Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc.

p.span: Tenga en cuenta que los horarios y lugares pueden cambiar según el uso y la necesidad. Si hubiera algún cambio en el horario, dichos cambios serán comunicados. Gracias a las generosas donaciones de Avery Dennison, Lifeline, Grand Rock Exhaust Solutions y Catalyst Ministry por hacer posible este servicio.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt

p.span: El estado ha promulgado una legislación que "permite a las escuelas recuperar a través del aprendizaje a distancia cualquier cantidad de días u horas necesarias para cumplir con los requisitos mínimos de horas de instrucción". Esto significa que estos días utilizados para impartir aprendizaje en línea se contarán como días de instrucción para el año escolar 2019-20, y no habrá necesidad de que el año escolar se extienda.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: ¿Qué pasa con las pruebas estatales y los requisitos de graduación?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: También se incluyen en la legislación reciente las disposiciones relacionadas con las pruebas estatales y los requisitos de graduación. No habrá pruebas estatales este año.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: En cuanto a los requisitos de graduación, la legislación "permite a las escuelas otorgar diplomas graduación a los estudiantes en camino a graduarse y para quienes el director determina que el estudiante ha completado con éxito el plan de estudios". Basado en esta directiva, y en el hecho de que los estudiantes no tienen acceso a las actividades necesarias para completar caminos alternativos o volver a tomar los exámenes estatales,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: el distrito ha elegido otorgar diplomas a cualquier estudiante de último año que complete los 21 créditos necesarios para graduarse. Los requisitos adicionales que generalmente se aplican (pruebas estatales, proyecto "capstone", prueba WorkKeys, horas de voluntariado, etc.) no se aplican

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Esto se aplica sólo a este año escolar, y está vigente mientras el Departamento de Educación de Ohio no emite directivas al contrario.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: ¿Qué pasa con los deportes y otras actividades?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: De acuerdo con las directivas del estado, y en interés de la salud y la seguridad de todos, todas las actividades del distrito continuarán suspendidas durante el período de cierre de la escuela.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: ¿Cómo pueden los estudiantes recuperar sus pertenencias de las escuelas?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: La recuperación de pertenencias personales se realizará de acuerdo con las directivas del Distrito de Salud General del Condado de Lake. Actualmente estamos esperando su guía. Una vez que recibamos esta guía, se compartirán los procedimientos y un horario.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: ¿Qué pasa con el baile de graduación y el comienzo?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Habíamos establecido tentativamente una fecha alternativa para el baile de graduación y la ceremonia de graduación (10 de julio y 19 de julio, respectivamente), el Departamento de Educación de Ohio ha emitido una declaración que impacta dichos eventos:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: "Entendemos la importancia, la tradición y los ritos de pasaje, muchos de Estos eventos representan, particularmente para nuestros estudiantes de último año, las escuelas deben realizar eventos virtualmente en lugar de realizar eventos en persona de este tipo, y registrar estos eventos siempre que sea posible y factible. No se deben celebrar ceremonias de graduación congregadas ".

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: La orientación estatal es que cualquier ceremonia de reconocimiento se celebre de acuerdo con las órdenes del Departamento de Salud de Ohio, y que se celebren virtualmente en lugar de en persona. En este momento, no sabemos exactamente cómo se ve esto. Sin embargo, es extremadamente importante que demos a nuestros graduados el reconocimiento que merecen, por lo que haremos todo lo posible para brindar este reconocimiento de acuerdo con las directivas de salud y seguridad del estado. Desafortunadamente, no vemos una forma de proporcionar una alternativa al baile de graduación en este momento. Se compartirá más información ya que hay más para desarrollar sobre estas preguntas.
